description: By Donald Chung. Based in part Grafana Dashboards for JupyterHub, Kubernetes for Prometheus Dashboard 20201209 and nVidia DCGM Dashboard

panels.description: Cluster Node Count, Cluster Pod Count, Cluster Pod Limit
panels.title: Pods

panels.description:
User pods getting close to their memory limit
Once they hit their memory limit, user kernels will start dying.
panels.title: User pods with high memory usage (>80% of limit)
User Pods with high CPU usage (>0.5)

panels.description: User pods that have been running for a long time (>8h). This often indicates problems with the idle culler
panels.title: Very old user pods

panels.description: This metric doesn't support filtering by node.
panels.title: User active age distribution

panels.description: This metric doesn't support filtering by node.
panels.title: Hub response latency

targets.expr: sum (sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(container) *8

sum (sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(container) *8

sum (sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(pod) *8

sum (sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(pod) *8

title: JupyterHub-Kubernetes-Dashboard
